description:
The American Journal of Transplantation delivers fast, high quality content in organ and tissue transplantation and the related sciences. It serves as an agent for advancing the international field of transplantation through critical reviews and news features, consensus documents and guidelines.  With the rapid publication of new articles every week it can be hard for clinicians and scientists to stay focused on the most relevant and useful content.  
In this app, you can easily access article abstracts and The AJT Report.  With access to a range of topics including thoracic transplantation (heart, lung), abdominal transplantation (kidney, liver, pancreas, islets) and transplantation of tissues, you can create a reading list tailored to your own interests. It’s simple and easy to navigate and presents an optimized reading experience from your mobile device.
